welcome: Welcome. This is a loan calculator. We will help you figure out how long it will take to pay off the loan.
aprMessage:
What is the Annual Percentage Rate (APR)?
Enter the percentage. (Ex: 5 % => 5)
loanDurationMessage: What is the loan duration in months ? (1 year = 12 months)
continueMessage: Do you want to do another Calculation? 1: Yes, 2: No
invalidValueMessage: This is not a valid value. Try again.
userInputsMessage: Below is the info you entered.
